verses.verse: Now it came <S%H1961><s%> about after <S%H310><s%> many <S%H7227><s%> days, <S%H3117><s%> when <S%H310><s%> <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> had given <S%H5117><s%> rest <S%H5117><s%> to Israel <S%H3478><s%> from all <S%H3605><s%> their enemies <S%H340><s%> on every <S%H5439><s%> side, <S%H5439><s%> and Joshua <S%H3091><s%> was old, <S%H2204><s%> advanced <S%H935><s%> in years, <S%H3117><s%>

that Joshua <S%H3091><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> for all <S%H3605><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> for their elders <S%H2205><s%> and their heads <S%H7218><s%> and their judges <S%H8199><s%> and their officers, <S%H7860><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to them, "I am <S%H2204><s%> old, <S%H2204><s%> advanced <S%H935><s%> in years. <S%H3117><s%>

"And you have seen <S%H7200><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> has done <S%H6213><s%> to all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> because <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> of you, for the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> is He who has been fighting <S%H3898><s%> for you.

"See, <S%H7200><s%> I have apportioned <S%H5307><s%> to you these <S%H428><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> which remain <S%H7604><s%> as an inheritance <S%H5159><s%> for your tribes, <S%H7626><s%> with all <S%H3605><s%> the nations <S%H1471><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I have cut <S%H3772><s%> off, <S%H3772><s%> from the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> even to the Great <S%H1419><s%> Sea <S%H3220><s%> toward the setting <S%H3996><s%> of the sun. <S%H8121><s%>

"And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> He shall thrust <S%H1920><s%> them out from before <S%H6440><s%> you and drive <S%H3423><s%> them from before <S%H6440><s%> you; and you shall possess <S%H3423><s%> their land, <S%H776><s%> just <S%H9201><s%> as the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> promised <S%H1696><s%> you.

"Be very <S%H3966><s%> firm, <S%H2388><s%> then, to keep <S%H8104><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that is written <S%H3789><s%> in the book <S%H5612><s%> of the law <S%H8451><s%> of Moses, <S%H4872><s%> so that you may not turn <S%H5493><s%> aside <S%H5493><s%> from it to the right <S%H3225><s%> hand <S%H3225><s%> or to the left, <S%H8040><s%>

in order that you may not associate <S%H935><s%> with these <S%H428><s%> nations, <S%H1471><s%> these <S%H428><s%> which remain <S%H7604><s%> among <S%H854><s%> you, or mention <S%H2142><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of their gods, <S%H430><s%> or make [anyone] swear <S%H7650><s%> [by them,] or serve <S%H5647><s%> them, or bow <S%H7812><s%> down <S%H7812><s%> to them.
"But you are to cling <S%H1692><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> as you have done <S%H6213><s%> to this <S%H2088><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>

"For the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has driven <S%H3423><s%> out great <S%H1419><s%> and strong <S%H6099><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> you; and as for you, no <S%H3808><s%> man <S%H376><s%> has stood <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you to this <S%H2088><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>

"One <S%H259><s%> of your men <S%H376><s%> puts <S%H7291><s%> to flight <S%H7291><s%> a thousand, <S%H505><s%> for the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> is He who fights <S%H3898><s%> for you, just <S%H9201><s%> as He promised <S%H1696><s%> you.
"So take <S%H8104><s%> diligent <S%H3966><s%> heed <S%H8104><s%> to yourselves <S%H5315><s%> to love <S%H157><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%>

"For if <S%H518><s%> you ever <S%H7725><s%> go <S%H7725><s%> back <S%H7725><s%> and cling <S%H1692><s%> to the rest <S%H3499><s%> of these <S%H428><s%> nations, <S%H1471><s%> these <S%H428><s%> which remain <S%H7604><s%> among <S%H854><s%> you, and intermarry <S%H2859><s%> with them, so that you associate <S%H935><s%> with them and they with you,

know <S%H3045><s%> with certainty <S%H3045><s%> that the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> will not continue <S%H3254><s%> to drive <S%H3423><s%> these <S%H428><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> out from before <S%H6440><s%> you; but they shall be a snare <S%H6341><s%> and a trap <S%H4170><s%> to you, and a whip <S%H7850><s%> on your sides <S%H6654><s%> and thorns <S%H6796><s%> in your eyes, <S%H5869><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> you perish from off <S%H6><s%> this <S%H5921><s%> good <S%H2088><s%> land <S%H2896><s%> which <S%H127><s%> the Lord <S%H834><s%> your God <S%H3068><s%> has given <S%H430><s%> you.

"Now behold, <S%H2009><s%> today <S%H3117><s%> I am going <S%H1980><s%> the way <S%H1870><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> the earth, <S%H776><s%> and you know <S%H3045><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> your hearts <S%H3824><s%> and in all <S%H3605><s%> your souls <S%H5315><s%> that not one <S%H259><s%> word <S%H1697><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> the good <S%H2896><s%> words <S%H1697><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> concerning <S%H5921><s%> you has failed; <S%H5307><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> have been fulfilled <S%H935><s%> for you, not one <S%H259><s%> of them has failed. <S%H5307><s%>

"And it shall come <S%H1961><s%> about that just <S%H9201><s%> as all <S%H3605><s%> the good <S%H2896><s%> words <S%H1697><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to you have come <S%H935><s%> upon you, so <S%H3651><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> will bring <S%H935><s%> upon you all <S%H3605><s%> the threats, <S%H7451><s%> <S%H1697><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> He has destroyed <S%H8045><s%> you from off <S%H5921><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> good <S%H2896><s%> land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> has given <S%H5414><s%> you.

"When you transgress <S%H5674><s%> the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> which <S%H834><s%> He commanded <S%H6680><s%> you, and go <S%H1980><s%> and serve <S%H5647><s%> other <S%H312><s%> gods, <S%H430><s%> and bow <S%H7812><s%> down <S%H7812><s%> to them, then the anger <S%H639><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> will burn <S%H2734><s%> against you, and you shall perish quickly <S%H6><s%> from off <S%H4120><s%> the good <S%H5921><s%> land <S%H2896><s%> which <S%H776><s%> He has given <S%H834><s%> you."
